name: Snitch Hunt
description:
Collect as much snitches as you can and beat the high score. Use various potions and other power ups to boost up your score.
Socessor's Stone gives you life.
ScoreUp Potion increases your score.
SlowMo Potion slows down your speed.
SpeedUp Potion takes you to turbo mode.
Cloak makes you Invisible.

Go Fly And Catch Those Snitches.
